name: Movie Hub
description: Curated sources specializing in movies, films, documentaries, and high-quality cinematic releases (including YTS and private APIs).
author: Kiyomi Movie Curators

providers.name: YTS (YIFY Movies)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Primary destination for high-quality movie torrents, known for small file sizes and consistent HD resolution.
providers.cautionReason: Some torrents may be unverified or community uploaded.

providers.name: The Pirate Bay (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Vast general index for movies, perfect for finding archival, niche, or older film releases.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: LimeTorrents (Public RSS)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Reliable public indexer with a large library of current and classic movie releases.
providers.cautionReason: Unverified public indexer. Contains potentially harmful/mislabelled torrents.

providers.name: TorrentDownload
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Public indexer providing a wide array of movie files, including hard-to-find, obscure releases.

providers.name: BitSearch.to
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Meta-search engine useful for tracking down movie files across diverse, international indexers.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious or misleading torrents.

providers.name: BTDigg
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Global DHT search engine; excellent for locating *older, large, or rare* film archives.
providers.cautionReason: Search results are often unverified and may contain malicious files.

providers.name: Snowfl
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General meta-search engine providing results from multiple sources; reliable for cross-checking movie availability.
providers.cautionReason: External meta-search results can be unverified.

providers.name: CloudTorrents (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: Modern API-based indexer offering structured, fast search results for films and documentaries.

providers.name: TorrentsCSV (API)
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: A collaborative git repository of torrents, consisting of a single, searchable torrents.csv file. It stores torrents with at least one seeder

providers.name: FileMood
providers.author: Kiyomi Community
providers.description: General indexer specializing in file search, useful for finding older or obscure movie archives.
